## RemirrorProps.initialContent property

Set the starting value object of the editor.

Without setting onStateChange remirror renders as an uncontrolled component. Value changes are passed back out of the editor and there is now way to set the value via props. As a result this is the only opportunity to directly control the rendered text.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initialContent: RemirrorContentType;
```
